definition: "knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
popular Taiwan snack, similar to a hamburger, steamed bun stuffed with pork, pickled vegetables, peanut powder and cilantro
Kariba or Kariwa, Japanese name/Kariwa, site of Japanese nuclear power plant near Niigata 新潟
Kashiwasaki Kariwa, site of Japanese nuclear power plant near Niigata 新潟

sentences.english: Meadows still smell of hay and the sweetness of cut grass.
sentences.chinese: 草場上披髮着新草垛及新刈綠草的清噴香。

sentences.english: Cutting intensity had no effect on the relative growth rate for Elymus nutans.
sentences.chinese: 三次刈割羊茅植株的相對生長速率最大。

sentences.english: Allowing the lawn to regenerate before the next mowing is also recommended.
sentences.chinese: 也建議您再次刈割前讓草坪有充份的再生長時間。

sentences.english: I'm cheesed off with having to mow the lawn every week.
sentences.chinese: 每個星期都得刈草坪真把我煩死了。

sentences.english: The highest nutritive values of sweetclover is during the period from prebloom to early bloom.
sentences.chinese: 現蕾至初花期刈割，刈草的營養成分含量最高。

sentences.english: Feasible cutting time for producing alfalfa leaf meal was bud appearing to 10% flowering phase.
sentences.chinese: 生產紫花苜蓿葉粉適宜刈割期爲現蕾至10%開花。

definition: new shoot growing from cut branch or stump
plant similar to coco-grass 莎草[suo1 cao3] (classical)
